name: Evolution (itch) (VegeBird)
description:
You (Kaiju) find someone has invaded your territory, they are well equipped and intelligent. The humans who have invaded your home are trying to harvest your resources and they seem to be preparing a weapon that threatens your survival. Thus, your time is limited, you will need to fend them off and destroy the superweapon with all your traits as a kaiju (Devour and Evolve)

Evolution is a hack-and-slash game. Player play as a Kaiju who can evolve to strengthen its power and fend humans off his planet. The game's main feature is the Kaiju can devour the dead bodies of humans to get evolve points, then the player can evolve to get perks and abilities to fight against humans.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Evolution is a student project created by Sleepless Nights, a team of game development students in UOWM.

Sleepless Nights members:
